name: The Everything Tweet Bot
description: A simgple Twitter bot to tweet a random phrase

WORDS_PREFIX.description: The prefix of the sentence to tweet (dont fill in unless you want a word)

WORDS_SUFFIX.description: The suffix of the sentence to tweet (dont fill in unless you want a word)

WORDS_SEPARATOR.description: The separator for the words (dont fill in if you want to use a space)

TWITTER_OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: The OAuth Access Token given to you by Twitter

TWITTER_OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: The OAuth Access Token Secret given to you by Twitter

TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY.description: The Consumer Key given to you by Twitter

TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET.description: The Consumer Secret given to you by Twitter
